author: The Film Theorists
description:
Thank you to @wbgames for sponsoring this video. Download DC Worlds Collide and play as your favorite heroes like Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, Harley Quinn, and more: https://dcwc.sng.link/Ai9oe/kl1f/iyo0 and use code DCWCEPICRPG for 100,000 coins in-game!

*💨 Subscribe to bend air!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

This is the ENTIRE timeline for the Avatar franchise, from the shows to the books to the comics and games and beyond. And we will be putting all of this together to predict the plot of the new show coming in the next few years!
